meta.description: Transformation Shot Sequence - MAXIMUM WEIGHTS 3.0 ON KEY PARTS
meta.notes: Key body parts at 3.0, supporting terms at 2.0+, LoRA 0.65-0.85

background_settings.clean_background_negative: scenery, landscape, sky, clouds, ground, buildings, complex background, outdoor, indoor, gradient

closeup_head.name: Head Closeup
closeup_head.prompt_template: (extreme closeup:3.0), (head only:3.0), (face filling frame:2.5), {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, glowing eyes, metallic, solo, (white background:2.0)
closeup_head.negative_extra: full body, legs, arms, torso, wide shot, body

closeup_wings.name: Wings Closeup
closeup_wings.prompt_template: (extreme closeup:3.0), (wings only:3.0), (back view:2.5), (no face:2.5), (no head:2.5), {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, mechanical wings, solo, (white background:2.0)
closeup_wings.negative_extra: face, head, front view, full body, legs, portrait, eyes

closeup_arms.name: Arms Closeup
closeup_arms.prompt_template: (extreme closeup:3.0), (arm only:3.0), (robot arm:2.5), (side view:2.0), (no face:2.5), {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, mechanical joints, solo, (white background:2.0)
closeup_arms.negative_extra: face, head, full body, legs, wings, portrait, eyes

closeup_legs.name: Legs Closeup
closeup_legs.prompt_template: (extreme closeup:3.0), (legs only:3.0), (robot legs:2.5), (low angle:2.0), (no face:2.5), {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, mechanical joints, solo, (white background:2.0)
closeup_legs.negative_extra: face, head, upper body, arms, portrait, eyes

closeup_chest.name: Chest Closeup
closeup_chest.prompt_template: (extreme closeup:3.0), (chest only:3.0), (torso:2.5), (no face:2.5), cropped at neck, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, chest armor, solo, (white background:2.0)
closeup_chest.negative_extra: full body, legs, head, face, wide shot, eyes

closeup_back.name: Back Closeup
closeup_back.prompt_template: (extreme closeup:3.0), (back only:3.0), (rear view:2.5), (jetpack:2.5), (no face:2.5), {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, wings backpack, solo, (white background:2.0)
closeup_back.negative_extra: face, front view, full body, portrait, eyes

extreme_closeup.name: Extreme Face Closeup
extreme_closeup.prompt_template: (macro shot:3.0), (face only:3.0), (eyes closeup:2.5), cropped edges, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, (huge glowing eyes:2.0), metallic, solo, (white background:2.0)
extreme_closeup.negative_extra: full body, torso, arms, legs, medium shot

closeup.name: Portrait Closeup
closeup.prompt_template: (portrait:2.5), (head and shoulders:2.5), upper body, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, confident expression, glowing eyes, solo, (white background:2.0)
closeup.negative_extra: full body, legs, feet, wide shot

medium.name: Medium Shot
medium.prompt_template: (medium shot:2.5), (waist up:2.5), upper body, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, heroic pose, solo, (white background:2.0)
medium.negative_extra: full body, legs visible, wide shot, feet

full.name: Full Body
full.prompt_template: (full body:2.0), (head to feet:2.0), entire body, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, heroic standing pose, arms spread, solo, (white background:2.0)

wide.name: Wide Shot
wide.prompt_template: (wide shot:2.5), (full body small:2.0), space around, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, epic heroic pose, solo, (white background:2.0)

stage_1.name: Stage 1 - Airplane
stage_1.prompt_template: (airplane mode:3.0), (aircraft:2.5), (no robot parts:2.5), no arms no legs, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, flying, solo, (white background:2.0)
stage_1.negative_extra: robot, humanoid, arms, legs, standing, bipedal

stage_2.name: Stage 2 - Early Transform
stage_2.prompt_template: (early transformation:2.5), (mostly airplane:2.0), panels shifting, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, glowing joints, energy, solo, (white background:2.0)

stage_3.name: Stage 3 - Mid Transform
stage_3.prompt_template: (mid transformation:3.0), (hybrid form:2.5), (half robot half plane:2.5), {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, arms extending, energy, solo, (white background:2.0)
stage_3.negative_extra: full robot, full airplane, complete form

stage_4.name: Stage 4 - Near Complete
stage_4.prompt_template: (late transformation:2.5), (mostly robot:2.0), robot body, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, wings backpack, sparkles, solo, (white background:2.0)

stage_5.name: Stage 5 - Complete
stage_5.prompt_template: (transformation complete:2.0), full robot, (superhero landing:2.5), one knee down, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, sparkles, solo, (white background:2.0)

heroic_pose_glow.name: Heroic Pose Glow
heroic_pose_glow.prompt_template: (heroic pose:2.0), hands on hips, full body, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, (body glowing:2.0), color aura, solo, (white background:2.0)

heroic_pose_burst.name: Heroic Pose Burst
heroic_pose_burst.prompt_template: dramatic pose, (arms spread:2.0), (energy burst:2.5), light rays, {trigger}, Super Wings, {colors}, epic moment, lens flare, solo, (white background:2.0)
